response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, as it is worth $800,000 to you and represents a significant investment for me. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending to you an offer to purchase this product at a special price of $750,000. I believe this is a fair deal that allows you to secure this valuable asset while also providing me with a satisfactory return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 750000}
